package.name: Metreos.Events.Reserve
package.description: Events used by the Reserve application

event.name: LaunchWorkerBee
event.description: Event that is used to trigger a WorkerBee script used to Send Execute commands.

event.name: Send
event.description: Used to tell a WorkerBee script to send an IP Phone Execute

event.name: Exit
event.description: USed to tell a WorkerBee script to exit
